p: Sensitivity analyses using G*Power (Faul et al., 2007) indicated that with the given sample size of N = 174, α = 0.05, and a power of 1 – β = 0.80, in a linear multiple regression with five predictors (four justice sensitivities, and moral disengagement in high carbon behavior), small effect sizes of R2 = 0.071 and with a power of 1 – β = 0.95 small effect sizes of R2 = 0.105 could be detected.
